    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        public java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String token,
                         java.lang.String tag)
        This method retrieves the masculine form of a given token, if it exists, when classified with a given PoS tag. Otherwise, it retrieves the same token (in lower case).
        Specified by:
        normalize in class Normalizer
        Parameters:
        token - the token whose lemma is wanted
        tag - the PoS tag of the token
        Returns:
        the masculine form of the token (when with the given tag)

      • normalize

        public java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String token,
                         java.lang.String tag,
                         int flags)
        This method retrieves the masculine form of a given token, if it exists, when classified with a given PoS tag. Otherwise, it retrieves the same token (in lower case).
        Parameters:
        token - the token whose lemma is wanted
        tag - the PoS tag of the token
        flags - the reductions that should be applied
        Returns:
        the masculine form of the token (when with the given tag)
